channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: ğŸ”´ 09:28 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Pokrovska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover!
item.description: ğŸ”´ 09:28 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Pokrovska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
